filebrowser.common.forbidden.message: You do not have the required permissions
filebrowser.common.writingFileFailed.message: Writing file failed. Please check if enough free storage is available on the device.
filebrowser.common.downloadingFile.title: Downloading file...
filebrowser.common.uploadingFile.title: Uploading file...

filebrowser.file-editor.conflictingChanges.title: Conflicting changes in '{{param}}'
filebrowser.file-editor.conflictingChanges.text: File was changed on the device and in the editor. You can save or discard your changes or cancel to continue editing.
filebrowser.file-editor.conflictingChangesWithErrors.text: File was changed on the device and in the editor. You can save (with validation errors!) or discard your changes. Cancel to continue editing.
filebrowser.file-editor.loadingSchemaFilesFailed.text: Loading schema file or one of its dependencies failed.
filebrowser.file-editor.saveWithErrors.title: Confirm saving
filebrowser.file-editor.saveWithErrors.text: There are validation errors. Save anyway?
filebrowser.file-editor.unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved changes in '{{param}}'
filebrowser.file-editor.unsavedChanges.text: You can save or discard your changes. Cancel to continue editing.
filebrowser.file-editor.unsavedChangesWithErrors.text: You can save (with validation errors!) or discard your changes. Cancel to continue editing.
filebrowser.file-editor.unsupportedFileFormat.text: Preview not supported for this file format
filebrowser.file-editor.unsupportedFileSize.text: Preview not supported due to file size

filebrowser.file-name-dialog.copyFile.title: Copy file

filebrowser.file-name-dialog.createFile.title: Create file

filebrowser.file-name-dialog.renameFile.title: Rename file

filebrowser.file-name-dialog.file.label: File
filebrowser.file-name-dialog.targetName.label: Target name
filebrowser.file-name-dialog.name.label: Name

filebrowser.file-name-dialog.cannotMoveToTarget.text: Cannot move element to this target directory.
